text: The Music of Silence is a 2017 Italian biographical musical drama movie directed by Michael Radford and starring Toby Sebastian, Luisa Ranieri, Jordi Molla, Antonio Banderas, Ennio Fantastichini. ==Other websites== * * Category:2017 drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2017 musical movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Italian musical movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Radford
title: The Music of Silence
